briefdescription.para: Contructor same as linphone_friend_new() + linphone_friend_set_address()
Set LinphoneAddress for this friend.
Contructor.
Contructor same as linphone_friend_new() + linphone_friend_set_address()

parameterdescription.para: a buddy address, must be a sip uri like sip:joe@sip.linphone.org

simplesect.para: a new LinphoneFriend with address initialized

briefdescription.para: Destroy a LinphoneFriend.
Set LinphoneAddress for this friend.
Get address of this friend.

simplesect.para: the LinphoneAddress object returned is hold by the LinphoneFriend, however calling several time this function may return different objects.

briefdescription.para: Adds an address in this friend.
Returns a list of LinphoneAddress for this friend.

simplesect.para: A list of LinphoneAddress objects. LinphoneAddress

briefdescription.para: Removes an address in this friend.
Adds a phone number in this friend.
Returns a list of phone numbers for this friend.

simplesect.para: A list of const char * objects. const char *

briefdescription.para: Removes a phone number in this friend.
Set the display name for this friend.
Get the display name for this friend.

simplesect.para: The display name of this friend

briefdescription.para: get subscription flag value

simplesect.para: returns true is subscription is activated for this friend

briefdescription.para: Configure LinphoneFriend to subscribe to presence information.

parameterdescription.para: if TRUE this friend will receive subscription message

briefdescription.para: Configure incoming subscription policy for this friend.
get current subscription policy for this LinphoneFriend
Starts editing a friend configuration.

detaileddescription.para: Because friend configuration must be consistent, applications MUST call linphone_friend_edit() before doing any attempts to modify friend configuration (such as address or subscription policy and so on). Once the modifications are done, then the application must call linphone_friend_done() to commit the changes.

briefdescription.para: Commits modification made to the friend configuration.
Get the status of a friend.
Get subscription state of a friend.
Get the presence model of a friend.

simplesect.para: A LinphonePresenceModel object, or NULL if the friend do not have presence information (in which case he is considered offline)

briefdescription.para: Get the consolidated presence of a friend.

simplesect.para: The consolidated presence of the friend

briefdescription.para: Get the presence model for a specific SIP URI or phone number of a friend.

parameterdescription.para: The SIP URI or phone number for which to get the presence model

simplesect.para: A LinphonePresenceModel object, or NULL if the friend do not have presence information for this SIP URI or phone number

briefdescription.para: Set the presence model of a friend.

parameterdescription.para: The LinphonePresenceModel object to set for the friend

briefdescription.para: Set the presence model for a specific SIP URI or phone number of a friend.

parameterdescription.para: The SIP URI or phone number for which to set the presence model

briefdescription.para: Tells whether we already received presence information for a friend.

simplesect.para: TRUE if presence information has been received for the friend, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Store user pointer to friend object.
Retrieve user data associated with friend.
Set the reference key of a friend.

parameterdescription.para: The reference key to use for the friend.

briefdescription.para: Get the reference key of a friend.

simplesect.para: The reference key of the friend.

briefdescription.para: Check that the given friend is in a friend list.

simplesect.para: TRUE if the friend is in a friend list, FALSE otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Acquire a reference to the linphone friend.
Release a reference to the linphone friend.
Returns the LinphoneCore object managing this friend, if any.
Returns the vCard object associated to this friend, if any.
Binds a vCard object to a friend.
Creates a vCard object associated to this friend if there isn't one yet and if the full name is available, either by the parameter or the one in the friend's SIP URI.

parameterdescription.para: The full name of the friend or NULL to use the one from the friend's SIP URI

simplesect.para: true if the vCard has been created, false if it wasn't possible (for exemple if name and the friend's SIP URI are null or if the friend's SIP URI doesn't have a display name), or if there is already one vcard

briefdescription.para: Contructor same as linphone_friend_new() + linphone_friend_set_address()

simplesect.para: a new LinphoneFriend with vCard initialized

briefdescription.para: Saves a friend either in database if configured, otherwise in linphonerc.
